name: Capri Baby Crib
description: The Capri Baby Crib by Kifu Paris is the ultimate luxury piece for your child's bedroom. Inspired by the birth of her first child, Kifu Augousti designed this piece to embrace the whimsical world of a child. The piece is inlaid in cream shagreen with bronze-patina brass details. The mattress is included with the piece and includes three drawers for practical use. Available with quartz inserts and other variations. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, but this showcases the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
